name: Jungle Cubes
description:
Blast your way through a tropical paradise in this challenging match-3 adventure!

MATCH colorful gems to solve puzzles and set off explosive chain reactions

COMPETE with your friends to see who can get the best score

EXPLORE the gorgeous tropical world and discover new lands

This colorful puzzle game is the ultimate challenge for your brain:
- Drag and drop gems to make wild combinations
- Clear sticky mud
- Blast away cobwebs
- Dig up shimmering gold

Free the guardians from their curse and unlock exciting new areas to continue your journey.

Start your adventure today - play Bounty Blast now!
